replies.author: 冰吻
replies.txt_content: /clear ID 清空某个玩家的背包

replies.author: Zhao_Hanyu
replies.txt_content:
冰吻 发表于 2020-6-23 20:25
/clear ID 清空某个玩家的背包
只清这一个

replies.author: 希望工程
replies.txt_content:
/clear ID 清背包
指定物品清除指令：/kill @e[name=英文名]
/remove drops [自己为中心格数内物品]
